item.title: 10 things I loved about magical Cappadocia
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
I didn’t know what to expect Cappadocia. All I knew before visiting this famous region of Turkey (pronounced cappa-doe-kiya, as I subsequently discovered) was that there were caves that you could stay in, the hot air ballooning was pretty good and there were fairy chimneys made out of rock . I arrived after an hour’s […]

The post 10 things I loved about magical Cappadocia appeared first on Duff's Suitcase.

item.title: A hobbit’s cave fantasy
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
Hezen Cave Hotel made me want to become a troglodyte if it meant that I could live in one of their cave suites (rather than the damp, dark, musty, cold algae-covered hovels I’d always associated with the word ‘cave’). With a massive lounge area, sleek glass-walled bathroom, huge airy bedroom and funky, bright modern-retro decor […]

The post A hobbit’s cave fantasy appeared first on Duff's Suitcase.

item.title: Luxury cave living in Cappadocia
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
What most excited me about visiting Cappadocia, in central Turkey, other than hot air ballooning over fairy chimneys with a hundred other balloons littering the sky, was the prospect of staying in a cave hotel. Cappadocia’s landscape is covered in surreal volcanic rock towers, gorges, villages with rock castles perched above them, and thousands of […]

The post Luxury cave living in Cappadocia appeared first on Duff's Suitcase.

item.title: Hot air ballooning in Cappadocia: the best airborne experience you can have
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
I’ve floated above the gemsbok on the dunes of the Namib Desert and over majestic forts in Rajasthan (which I thought were pretty amazing experiences), and I thought I’d ticked hot air ballooning off my list of cool things to do. Then I went hot air ballooning in Cappadocia, central Turkey. As the purple sky […]

The post Hot air ballooning in Cappadocia: the best airborne experience you can have appeared first on Duff's Suitcase.

item.title: Why Turkey should be on your bucket list
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
I was really excited to visit Turkey for the first time recently, and imagined  having a pretty good trip. It blew me away. From the moment I arrived in Istanbul, I loved every moment of being in this amazing country. I had no idea how beautiful, diverse, culturally rich, friendly and historically fascinating Turkey was, and […]

The post Why Turkey should be on your bucket list appeared first on Duff's Suitcase.

item.title: Turkish delight
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
I’m off in just over a week to a country I’ve never been to before and I couldn’t be more excited. I decided to plan an early-summer trip to Turkey for three reasons: 1. There are cheap flights from Cape Town (R6000 return on Turkish Airlines, direct to Istanbul) 2. South Africans don’t need a […]

The post Turkish delight appeared first on Duff's Suitcase.
